columns.dc:description: The name of the organisation to which the counter fraud activity relates.
A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) which identifies the organisation.
Date at which the information provided is true, in the ISO international date format YYYY-MM-DD.
Number of occasions the organisation used its powers under the Prevention of Social Housing Fraud (Power to Require Information) (England) Regulations 2014, or similar powers.
Total number of employees undertaking investigations and prosecutions of fraud.
Total full time equivalent numbers of employees undertaking investigations and prosecutions of fraud.
Total number of professionally accredited counter fraud specialists.
Total full time equivalent numbers of professionally accredited counter fraud specialists.
Total amount spent by the organisation in GBP on the investigation and prosecution of fraud.
Total number of fraud cases investigated.
Total number of occasions on which fraud was identified.
Total monetary value in GBP of the fraud that was detected.
Total monetary value in GBP of the fraud that was recovered.
Total number of cases of irregularity investigated.
Total number of occasions on which an irregularity was identified.
Total monetary value in GBP of the irregularity that was detected.
Total monetary value in GBP of the irregularity that was recovered.
